sources.title: The Killers (1946)
sources.description: The Killers is a 1946 American film noir directed by Robert Siodmak and starring Burt Lancaster in his film debut, along with Ava Gardner, Edmond O'Brien and Sam Levene. Based in part on the 1927 short story of the same name by Ernest Hemingway. The film  follows an insurance investigator named Jim Reardon who looks into the murder of a gas station attendant known as "The Swede." The film begins with two hitmen arriving to kill The Swede, who makes no attempt to escape, leading Reardon to uncover the tragic backstory of The Swede's life, including his involvement with a femme fatale and a crime boss, through a series of flashbacks.

sources.title: The Killers (1946) Burt Lancaster, Ava Gardner, Edmond O' Brien - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: The Killers (also known as A Man Alone) is a 1946 American film noir directed by Robert Siodmak and based in part on the 1927 short story of the same name by Ernest Hemingway. It stars Burt Lancaster in his film debut, Ava Gardner, Edmond O'Brien and Sam Levene. The film also features William Conrad in his first credited role, as one of the killers referred to in the title.   In 2008, The Killers was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant."   Hemingway, who was habitually disgusted with how Hollywood distorted his intentions was a fan of the film stating "It is a good picture and the only good picture ever made of a story of mine." Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Killers_(1946_film)  Suggested Film Noirs : http://bit.ly/36oLNCR The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: Two professional killers invade a small town and kill a gas station attendant, "the Swede," who's expecting them. Insurance investigator Reardon pursues the case against the orders of his boss, who considers it trivial. Weaving together threads of the Swede's life, Reardon uncovers a complex tale of treachery and crime, all linked with gorgeous, mysterious Kitty Collins.
metadata.Writer: Anthony Veiller, Ernest Hemingway, John Huston
metadata.Actors: Burt Lancaster, Ava Gardner, Edmond O'Brien
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. 4 wins & 4 nominations total
